title: "NIH-funded study uses AI to improve language for children with cochlear implants"
excerpt: "A new multicenter study will use artificial intelligence (AI) to analyze pre-surgical brain MRI scans to predict individual-level language outcomes in English- and Spanish-learning children up to four years after cochlear implantation."
